Taujuanna needs working capital in order to expand her service areas further. Looking toward the future, Taujauanna says she plans for Xquisite Staff to become a global company and promote brands all around the world.

You can find out more about how Xquisite Staff enhances brands and increases sales by visiting their website, http://www.xquisitestaff.com, or Facebook page, https://www.facebook.com/XquisiteStaff/timeline.

loans.use: to have working capital to expand her service areas.

loans.name: Alicia Aracely

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito La 24 se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Alicia  tiene 45 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre  y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 20 y 15 años de edad, los mismos que estudian en universidad y  colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.
Alicia es una mujer que le gusta trabajar y así junto a su marido sacar adelante su hogar, ella junto a su marido se dedican al comercio, compran y venden pescado por libras o al por mayor, ellos se desplazan hasta las playas de la localidad lugar en el cual compra a muy buen precio y luego llevan a su casa en la cual entregan a otros comerciantes minoristas y también ahí mismo ellos venden al público en general por libras, lleva 4  años en esta actividad la cual les permite salir adelante, ella está muy agradecida con las personas que le ayudan para que pueda recibir los créditos. 
Este crédito es para comprar pescado. Lleva 2 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten salir adelante. Sus sueños son seguir adelante contando con Dios y la ayuda de los créditos.
texts.en:
The credit group "La 24" (The 24) meets every two weeks in the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited year round and for being a city with unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions. 
Alicia, who is 45 years old, married, and has two children who are 20 and 15 years old and attend college and high school, lives in Manta. Her husband is a merchant. 
Alicia is a woman who likes to work; together with her husband she supports her household. She and her husband work together in business, they buy and sell fish buy the pound or wholesale, they go to the beaches of the city where they buy the fish at a very good price and then take it to their house where they sell it to other retailers and also by the pound directly to the public, they've spent 4 years working in this activity which allows them to move forward, she is very thankful for the people that help them by lending them money. 
This loan is to buy fish. She's been in the Credit Group for 2 years and likes it because the loans help her move forward. Her dreams are to continue forward with the help of God and the loans.

loans.use: To buy fish.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una señora que trabaja como operaría de máquinas en una fábrica, es casada y tiene dos hijos menores de edad. Necesita urgentemente un implante de lente intraocular en el ojo derecho debido a que sufre de cataratas en ambos ojos, lo que le ha provocado perdida de la vista. La señora está incapacitada desde hace dos meses, esto afecta su economía y también le dificulta solventar el gasto de la operación
texts.en:
The borrower is a woman who works as a machine operator in a factory. She is married and has two minor children. She urgently needs an intraocular lens implant in her right eye because she suffers from cataracts in both eyes, which has caused vision loss.

This woman has been incapacitated for two months. It is affecting her finances and also making it difficult to pay the expenses of the operation.

loans.use: to get ophthalmic treatment.

loans.name: Mireille

texts.en:
Mireille now hired five more people to work in her workshop. With twelve people in her workshop, she has been able respect all her contracts. Moreover, Mireille has generated profits to support her children's school tuition. They are now almost finished with secondary schools.

Today, Mireille would like to renew the experience with Zafen. She requests a loan to buy sequins, beads, and spangles in bulk to prepare for an international fair. This loan will allow her to create at least five more jobs, and she will manufacture more Haitian-style purses and handbags to sell.

loans.use: to purchase sequins, beads, and spangles in bulk.

loans.name: Martine

texts.fr:
Martine a 46 ans. Elle est mariée à un chauffeur et a 6 enfants dont l’un s’est déjà marier et les autres sont encore à sa charge et scolarisés. Le couple est propriétaire de son domicile. Ils ont pour objectif de construire, à l’aide de l’épargne, des maisons qui serviront d’héritage pour leurs descendances.
Martine est dans la vente de matériel en plastique depuis 2005. Pour pouvoir réaliser son objectif, elle doit travailler dur disait-elle. Sa priorité est l'avenir de ses enfants. Elle ne voudrait pas la même vie qu'elle pour eux. De ce fait, elle voudrait développer et étendre l'activité afin de pouvoir améliorer le revenu familial, de couvrir toutes les dépenses et charges et surtout épargner davantage.
texts.en:
Martine is 46 years old. Her husband is a driver. They have six children, one of whom is already married; the other five are still in school and supported by their parents. Martine and her husband own their home. Their goal is to save to build houses they could pass on to their children.

Martine has been selling plastic supplies since 2005. She says that she needs to work hard to realize her dreams. Her priority is her children's future. She would not want them to have the same kind of life she had. Therefore, she would like to keep expanding her business in order to improve her family's income, to take care of all costs and expenses, and, before all, to grow her savings.

loans.use: to buy plastic pails, bowls, plate racks etc.

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is married and has two children. She has her own business. With her previous loan, Irina purchased goods and increased her sales. She is a hardworking and responsible person who wants to develop the business further.

This time Irina is asking for a loan of 50,000 UAH to purchase men's winter clothing. The loan will help Irina to increase the assortment of shirts and sweaters for sale.

loans.use: to buy men's winter clothing

loans.name: Bernarda

texts.en:
Bernarda, a 63-year-old married woman with five grown children, earns a living by operating a ready-to-wear business selling clothing and household items such as blankets and kitchen wares. She also has a meat-vending business. Her husband earns a living by farming.

Bernarda would like to sell more supplies, but she has insufficient capital to make bulk purchases. She has therefore requested a loan to purchase supplies of ready-to-wear and meat products. This will enable her to meet the needs of her respective clients and gain higher earnings.

Bernarda is hoping that she will become successful in her project to improve the family’s living conditions in preparation for old age.

loans.use: to acquire additional capital to purchase supplies of ready-to-wear and meat products.

loans.name: Ramón Eduardo

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito La 24 se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive don Ramón, tiene 38 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 14 y 12 años de edad, ambos estudian en colegio y escuela. Su mujer es comerciante.
Ramón es un hombre muy  trabajador que le gusta siempre ir mejorando su vida a base de trabajo honrado, el junto a su mujer se dedican al comercio, tienen una tienda de víveres en su casa, allí venden todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad, cosas de bazar, papelería, helados, agua en bidón, colas y muchos otros productos que siempre le ayudan  a mejorar su clientela que a diario visitan su local. Gracias a los créditos ellos han podido mejorar y surtir mas su tienda.
Este crédito lo va a invertir en compra víveres, artículos de bazar y papelería.  Lleva más de  4 años  en el Grupo De Crédito y está muy agradecido con las personas que le ayudan para que pueda recibir el crédito que tanta falta les hace para seguir adelante en su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
La 24 Credit Group meets twice per month in the city of Manta, which is known for its gorgeous beaches that attract visitors year-round and for being a uniquely beautiful city with many tourist attractions.

This city is home to Ramón, who is 38 years old and has two children with his partner. His children are 14 and 12 years old and both are in school. His wife is a businesswoman.

Ramón is a very hardworking man who likes to be constantly improving his life through honest work. He and his wife work in a grocery store that they have in their house. They sell all sorts of basic necessities, variety items, stationery, ice cream, jugs of water, soft drinks, and many other products that always help them to improve their clientele who visit their store every day. Thanks to loans, they have been able to improve their store and stock it with more variety.

They are going to invest this loan in buying food supplies, variety items, and stationary products. He has been part of this credit group for more than four years, and he is very grateful to the people who help him to be able to get the loan that they so need in order to be successful in their business. His dream is to give his children the best.

loans.use: to buy food supplies and stationery products.

loans.name: Shakar

texts.ru: Шакар, 56 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, Шакар на протяжении 2 лет занимается торговлей женской одежды, начав этот бизнес с суммы 50,000 сом(KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Шакар в обороте есть товар на сумму 150,000 сом (KGS). Бизнес приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Шакар обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одежды для увеличения ассортимента. Доходы от кредита Шакар планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en:
Shakar is 56 years old, married and the mother of two. As a main source of income for her family, Shakar has been selling women's clothing for two years, having launched this business with 50,000 KGS. Thanks to Shakar's hard work, she now has a merchandise stock worth 150,000 KGS. Her business brings in about 10,000 KGS per month. 

In order to develop her business further, Shakar has applied to the Bai Tushum bank for a loan in the amount of 30,000 KGS to buy clothing  so as to increase her  merchandise selection. Shakar plans to use the resulting revenue to continue developing her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes in order to increase the merchandise assortment in her shop.

loans.name: Jose Carlos Guadalupe

texts.en:
Jose Carlos is a farmer who lives in El Seco in the State of Puebla with his wife and children. He and his wife have had years of sacrifice to build the home in which they now live.

However, the budget ran low at the end and they could not finish the bathroom. This leaves the family in a complicated situation as they bathe outside or sometimes in the neighbor's shower, and they use an improvised latrine in the backyard. The family has been living like this for a year. They are ready to do what is needed to complete the house and provide a better life for all members.

As Jose Carlos's job is informal and he does not receive a regular income, getting credit from other institutions is very difficult. With the credit he is requesting, Jose Carlos and his oldest son Saul (shown in the picture) will work to build and properly install the bathroom. They will receive assistance and supervision from certified technicians to make sure the work is properly done and that it meets all the safety and quality standards. When this work is completed, the family will then be able to lead a healthier lifestyle.

loans.use: to provide his family with better hygiene and a better life by completing installation of their bathroom.
